text: France and Fiji have played each other a total of 10 times, of which France has won the most with 9 wins. Their first meeting was in 1964; France won this match 21–3. ==Summary== ===Overall=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !width="125"| Details !width="125"| Played !width="125"| Won by !width="125"| Won by !width="125"| Drawn !width="125"| France points !width="125"| Fiji points |- | In France | 7 | 6 | 1 | 0 | -- | -- |- | In Fiji | 1 | 1 | 0 | 0 | -- | -- |- | Neutral venue | 2 | 2 | 0 | 0 | -- | -- |-class="sortbottom" | Overall | 10 | 9 | 1 | 0 | 373 | 132 |} ===Records=== Note: Date shown in brackets indicates when the record was or last set. {| class="wikitable" |- !Record !France !Fiji |- |Longest winning streak | |- !colspan=3 align=center|Largest points for |- |Home | |- |Away | |- !colspan=3 align=center|Largest winning margin |- |Home | | |- |Away | | |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- !
